job_title: SAP Business Analyst with Dot Net Exp

job_details.degree_required: Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Information Technology, or a related field.

jd: Hi There, Please have a look below JD and let me know if you are interested in joining a new project. SAP Business Analyst with Dot Net Exp _Remote Contractual Role Key Responsibilities:Requirements Gathering: Engage with business stakeholders to collect and analyze requirements for SAP solutions, ensuring alignment with organizational goals.Functional Documentation: Write comprehensive functional design documents (FD) that detail system requirements, specifications, and business processes.Test Case Development: Develop and document test cases based on functional requirements to validate system functionality.Testing Execution: Conduct various testing phases, including system integration testing (SIT) and user acceptance testing (UAT), ensuring the quality and reliability of SAP solutions.Test Data Preparation: Create and manage test data sets necessary for conducting rigorous testing.Process Mapping: Develop process flow diagrams to illustrate business processes and system interactions, enhancing stakeholder understanding.Collaboration with Teams: Work closely with development teams, project managers, and other stakeholders to facilitate successful SAP implementations.Manufacturing Experience: Utilize prior manufacturing experience to provide insights and recommendations throughout the project lifecycle.Qualifications/Education: Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Information Technology, or a related field.Experience:10 years of experience as a Business Systems Analyst, specifically within SAP.Proficiency in .NET technologies and familiarity with install base concepts.Experience in manufacturing environments is a plus. Skills:Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities.Excellent written and verbal communication skills.Proficient in creating functional specifications and test cases.Experience with process mapping and flow diagram creation. Please share below detail,Attach your resume ::Work Authorization ::Best Hourly Rate or Employer :: Warm Regards,Sanaullah
